DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety SU011248 ( Sunitinib/Sutent ) combination docetaxel patient metastatic locally recurrent breast cancer receive chemotherapy treatment advance disease setting .
DOC.brief_title: Study Of SU011248 In Combination With Docetaxel In Patients With Metastatic Breast Cancer
